turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on US 19 in St. Petersburg, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so a grande cafe mocha with 2% milk, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at us 19 in st petersburgh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
